# PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionAmountDescription.preauthorizationAmount(_:)

**Case**

Places a temporary hold on the customer’s account for the specified amount. Only allowed for [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardTransactionRequest/TransactionType/purchase]

## Declaration

```swift
case preauthorizationAmount(Decimal)
```
title: PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionAmountDescription.preauthorizationAmount(_:)
